attributes.action: Have an Arts/Sports club built on the creamery recreation grounds, Letchworth
attributes.additional_details: North Herts District Council are currently paving and added greenery to the unused area, which so desperately needs a small centre that can provide a changing area to the local teams that play there, and a meeting/function area for the local children to have a safe and monitored environment to be in. This could also provide local clubs with a low-cost place to hold their sessions.
attributes.background: The Creamery recreation grounds already has a fenced off basketball/ five a side court, 2 tennis courts, 2 football fields and a small play area. There is an area next to it that used to be changing rooms. I propose to have this unused (for 20 years) area redeveloped with an activity centre.

rejection.details:
